author: Ron Pickel
comment: Looks great but when I changed temperature from Celsius to Fahrenhiet the app crashed and froze. I uninstalled and reinstalled to no avail.

author: John Wood
comment: Brilliant app.. Very versatile!... A y chance you could have a football Oi on instead of Germany or so?

reply.author: Mobi Market Labs
reply.content: Please, write to our support e-mail: support@mobimarketlabs.com. We are ready to help. Thanks.

author: Inthikhab Raban
comment: Love this watch face, only fix need I see is SMS count does not reset after reading the message. Hope the developer would fix. Please fix.

reply.author: Mobi Market Labs
reply.content: Check permissions (Read SMS)  for Configuration app. Thanks.

author: Shimon Kazachkov
comment: I believe you know that in ambient mode the brightness settings are relates to the text only, but there is no option to adjust marks and hands brightness. That eats up to 30% of battery a day. On my Moto 360 2nd gen 46mm your ambient mode looks ugly, not as it looks on your preview on the google play or at the settings page. The whatch face is perfect, but  not the ambient mode. And yes, antialiasing enabled.

reply.author: Mobi Market Labs
reply.content:
You wrote that you do not like the brightness in ambient mode. Do you where to find the answer in the ambient brightness setting mode. What is the problem? The brightness is not adjustable?
Thanks.

author: Vahe Kassardjian
comment: Sluggish UI. The app is very slow to react. Unpleasant experience
title: Nice visual design but poor implementation

author: Bruce Jones
comment: Beautiful.  However, it is not recognizing wrist gestures on NB RunIQ.  Other than that, the best WF I have.

reply.author: Mobi Market Labs
reply.content:
Our watch faces is not involved in the processing of the system functions gestures (smart watches).
Try to check the settings of your smart watch.
Thanks for your feedback!

comment: Doesn't work as advertised. Just a little heads up.

reply.author: Mobi Market Labs
reply.content:
The app has been tested and approved by Google for use on Android Wear devices.
Do you have questions or need technical support? E-mail customer support: support@mobimarketlabs.com

title: Don't bother

author: Dominick Scavone
comment: Quickly became a favorite.

reply.author: Mobi Market Labs
reply.content: Thanks for your feedback! Please, check new version.

title: Great face

author: Graham Garrett
comment: Says no watch connected. Clearly connected. Restarted, re paired, did all I could. Won't work. Installed. AVOID! I EXPECT A REFUND!

reply.author: Mobi Market Labs
reply.content:
Payment has not been received from you. Your order has been canceled.
Remove our app, its use is not legal.

title: Doesn't work

comment: Needs redevelopment, it won't interact properly
title: Rambo3

author: James Carter
comment: Ambient mode - cannot change hands or hour brightness - too bright and blocky,  battery life not so good,  cannot show phone and watch battery at the same time...... Unless someone can tell me otherwise!

reply.author: Mobi Market Labs
reply.content:
Something about the battery life https://plus.google.com/+Mobimarketlabs/posts/iWmensEpzC2
Being finished the next update of the application. Coming soon.

title: It's one of my favourite designs but

author: roy higgins
comment: Did everything to get this crappy app to work! Google please remove from play store, not fit for purpose!! DO NOT PURCHASE!! My watches are a Tag Heuer Connected and Huawei W1. Buyers beware!!!

reply.author: Mobi Market Labs
reply.content:
1. Check smart watches firmware updates.
2. Uninstall watch face with "CLEAR DATA" & "CLEAR CACHE".
3. Reinstall  watch face.
For more info or support, please, write e-mail on our address: support@mobimarketlabs.com
Thanks.

title: Poor! Poor! Poor!

author: Chris Miller
comment: Despite following all directions could never make it work. Now past refund time.
title: Bad app

author: Simon Fuller
comment: Unintuitive and annoyingly frustrating to make changes.

author: Dinesh Silva
comment: Ambient mode not like previewed. Dial and hands same shade white, jagged edges. Would prefer color ambient mode with no animation and reduced brightness...

reply.author: Mobi Market Labs
reply.content: Set the resolution in the smoothing of the dial settings. The settings are available through Android Wear Assistant.

title: No control over ambient mode

author: Asaf I
comment: Also take too many times until I was able to get it to work , and unfortunately can't find where to get refund for that .....

reply.author: Mobi Market Labs
reply.content: Please, check the permissions for application, then re-install watchface: uninstall previous version with "CLEAR CACHE" and "CLEAR DATA". New version(update) not compatible with old version. The new application works as well as the previous one. Thanks. Please, try update.

title: Can't update the design and hard to set

author: William Houston
comment: I really like the ability to change the texture (carbon looks great). Night mode is great too. I just hope enabling anti-aliasing doesn't cause too much of a drain on the battery.
title: My favorite color combo

author: Chun-wing Steven Si
comment: Please! I know its battery saving but let us decide if we want a full watch face in ambient mode. Please enable a full watch face ambient mode! Cheers. Its a beautiful watch face. Moto360(2)

reply.author: Mobi Market Labs
reply.content: Hello. We will think about turning on this capability.

title: Nice yellow watch face

author: AC Jay
comment: The design is awesome! I will give the 5 rating when an update comes with an option to hide the steps display or can change it with the germany logo.. Thanks!

reply.author: Mobi Market Labs
reply.content: Thanks! :) We are pleased that you enjoyed it. A new version will be soon.
